description: Explore the roles and responsibilities of Management and Directors in protecting the interests of Shareholders and other Stakeholders.  Topics include: the history of Corporate Governance, Board of Directors responsibilities, Corporate Governance nuances outside of the U.S., and current trends in Corporate Governance.  Analyze how an entity's Corporate Governance environment can either prevent or permit failures and have a direct impact on the success of an organization.

children: declared in graduate Business Exchange program
